Class XmlNamespaceContext

java.lang.Object
org.opencastproject.util.XmlNamespaceContext

NamespaceContext
public final class XmlNamespaceContext extends Object implements NamespaceContext

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    XmlNamespaceContext(Map<String,String> prefixToUri)
    Create a new namespace context with bindings from prefix to URI and bind the default namespaces as described in the documentation of NamespaceContext.
